author: sha1123

review: The only downside I see in this product is that you must ALWAYS have the mobile device or computer available to get the content. There is no remote to get you into content a La Roku. But then again this device is increadibly affordable. I can cast content on my mobile and walk away or open a tab in my Chrome browser and do some other activity while the movie or video is streaming in another room (must be on the same network wired/wireless or combo doesn't matter). I've also found a way to use plex to stream local media content from my local network, great for home movies!Again, I half wish this had a remote seperate that I could browse the network from but then I guess that defeats the idea of CASTING.
